thread.title: Cassandra Kendrick
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Cassandra Kendrick

author: Cassandra Kendrick
title: Cassandra Kendrick
text:
I would highly recommend Optima Tax Relief! They're very courteous, professional & do a great job communicating with you keeping you informed & promptly returning phone calls in a timely manner!
Lastly, my tax issue was resolved favorably!!! I'm eternally grateful to the Optima Tax Relief team!!!
THANK YOU all so very much!
